# NSColor.ColorType.catalog

**Case**

Colors that are retrieved from an asset catalog.

## Declaration

```swift
case catalog
```

## Discussion

Colors of this type have values for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/catalogNameComponent] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/colorNameComponent] properties. A color of this type may also have device- and appearance-specific representations, allowing you to convert it to other types.

## Color Types

- **NSColor.ColorType.componentBased**: Colors that include floating-point color components and a color space.
- **NSColor.ColorType.pattern**: Colors that include an image to be used as a pattern.
